answerText: "The Necklace" [or "The Diamond Necklace"; or "La Parure"] [10]  "The Necklace" was written by this French author who also wrote "Boule de Suif" about a prostitute in a coach stopped by Prussian soldiers.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 5 | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Monsieur and Madame Loisel slave for ten years to replace the title object of this story.  [10] Name this story whose title object Mathilde borrows from her friend Jeanne Forestier and loses, but later discovers was made of paste, not diamonds.
